m_szDocTitle: Mercedes-Benz Could Launch Next Fuel-Cell Car In 2017
m_szDocSumamry: Mercedes-Benz Could Launch Next Fuel-Cell Car In 2017 Email This Page To (separate emails with commas) Message (optional) Your email was sent successfully. Close 15,095 views Mar 14, 2014 Follow Antony Mercedes-Benz has delved into the world of fuel-cell vehicles before, with several concepts and the F-Cell prototype from a few years back. But so far--like most automakers--there's not been a model people can actually buy. That might change in 2017, according to Motoring (via Motor Authority ), as the German automaker is already making plans for a "next generation" fuel-cell vehicle. Mercedes'
